sentences.en: An unsung editor deserves some of the orchids.
sentences.cn: 默默无闻的编辑理应受到一些赞扬.
他的英勇行为无人赏识.

sentences.en: It is little known, unsung and one of the grandest little towns you could ever wish to see.
sentences.cn: 它虽然名不见经传，但却是不可错过的最具恢宏气象的小镇之一。

sentences.en: No matter to Luke, the Unsung.
sentences.cn: 对于未被赞扬的卢克来说, 这也不算什么.

sentences.en: one of the unsung heroes of French politics
sentences.cn: 法国政坛的一位无名英雄
那位英雄死时未受到歌颂.

sentences.en: the unsung heroes of the war
There are sun and rain , there are unsung heroes of the figure.
sentences.cn: 这里有阳光和雨露, 有默默耕耘的身影.

sentences.en: They are among the unsung heroes of our time.
sentences.cn: 他们是我们这个时代的无名英雄。

sentences.en: They are very hard - working, and they are unsung because nobody knows what they are doing.
sentences.cn: 他们工作很努力, 只因为无人知晓而没没无闻.

sentences.en: They lived untrumpeted, and died unsung.
sentences.cn: 他们生时不名噪一时,死时也平平淡淡.

trans.tran_cn: 未唱的，未经赞美的，未被承认的
trans.tran_en: not praised or famous for something you have done, although you deserve to be
